name: stock-bot
description: Stock Bot gives you the ability to quickly check a stock value from ~~any~~ available stock market globally, directly ~~from~~ on Discord. > Stock Bot currently only works on *depends* ## Installation ### Create a Discord App - Create a Discord account - Go to https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/me/create to create a new discord app - Once your app is created click on **Create a Bot User** - Invite your bot to your discord server ### Run the install ``` git clone https://github.com/aidanwardman/Stock-Bot cd Stock-Bot npm install requirements.txt ``` ### Configure the bot > Better advised to use environment variables while hosting online - Create a file called **credentials.json** with the following structure ``` { 	"token":"ABCDEFG" } ```  - Replace **ABCDEFG** with your discord **App Bot User Token** ## Running ``` node bot.json ``` ## Usage *automated*
